data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My mother-in-law always says that I am welcome in her home. But she's never ____ warm ____ me. I ____ that ____ is ____ very ____ of ____, ____ though ____ would ____ admit ____ that. I do think she likes me more than my husband's previous girlfriends, though.
data.partBlankContent: My mother-in-law always says that I am welcome in her home. But she's never ve__ warm t_ me. I th___ that s__ is n__ very fo__ of m_, ev__ though s__ would ne___ admit t_ that. I do think she likes me more than my husband's previous girlfriends, though.
data.fullContent: My mother-in-law always says that I am welcome in her home. But she's never very warm to me. I think that she is not very fond of me, even though she would never admit to that. I do think she likes me more than my husband's previous girlfriends, though.
data.answer: 我岳母总是说她家里欢迎我。但她对我从来都不是很热情。我觉得她不是很喜欢我，虽然她从来不会承认。不过，我确实认为她比我丈夫的前女友更喜欢我。
